vatsim.uk Dark
data.description: VATSIM UK provides air traffic control and a wealth of information for controlling and flying in the United Kingdom on VATSIM. We pride ourselves in providing regular and high quality air traffic control for our pilots. This, combined with our great community, is what makes VATSIM UK such a great place to be. Get involved!

Piazza Darker
CleanGoogle v2
data.description: This is re-imagination of CleanGoogle with more customization options and with new implementation of Google Material 2. Google tends to test new feature really frequently and result of that the theme might not function well, please be pacient and wait for my fix. I am will no longer support the theme with new updates, feel free to use it to expand the theme I started. Customization Options - Switch between Fully White and Blend of Images styles - Choose your favorite images or gifs View customization guide & Image install guide at Google Docs.
